startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start URL for Jacksonville EXIT Realty agents list (page 1).

totalPages.title: Total pages to crawl
totalPages.description: Number of paginated pages to process (defaults to 8).

emitBrevoCsv.title: Also emit Brevo CSV to key-value store
emitBrevoCsv.description: If true, saves `brevo.csv` (EMAIL, FIRSTNAME, LASTNAME, SMS) to the key-value store.
